snippet: Also, John Green, a writer of critically acclaimed books for young adults, has a burgeoning performance career; the prosecutor in the Aaron Swartz case defends her office; and the ratings success of ABC's "Scandal" among African-American viewers.
abstract: Also, John Green, a writer of critically acclaimed books for young adults, has a burgeoning performance career; the prosecutor in the Aaron Swartz case defends her office; and the ratings success of ABC's "Scandal" among African-American viewers.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Levity Gets a Screening at Sundance, and Questions for Armstrong
